metadata.title: CVE-2022-27776 curl: auth/cookie leak on redirect (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A vulnerability was found in curl. This security flaw allows leak authentication or cookie header data on HTTP redirects to the same host but another port number. Sending the same set of headers to a server on a different port number is a problem for applications that pass on custom `Authorization:` or `Cookie:`headers. Those headers often contain privacy-sensitive information or data.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
jbcs-http24-curl is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
